job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pOur client is the next big thing Theyre in stealth mode backed by two householdname billionaires and focused on the war on cancerppbrppYou will work with a team of machine learning scientists and engineers to develop and deploy AIbased biomarkers to support the personalization of cancer therapy You will work closely with our engineering team to build productiongrade APIs and serving models that integrate with our clinical productppbrppstrongMinimum Qualifications strongpulliBS or MS in an AIrelated field CS EE Stats etc or substantial development experience in AIliliStrong programming skills competitive in ACMICPC or other competitionsliliSubstantial experience with Python and deep learning libraries such as PyTorch or TensorflowliliExperience in implementing highperformance and largescale deep learning systems liulpbrppstrongPreferred QualificationsstrongpulliFull time industry experience in deep learning researchproductliliExperience mentoring and advising other engineersliul
